response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential for those who appreciate its craftsmanship and utility. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs or collection.

To make this offer more attractive, I am willing to extend a special deal to you. For a limited time only, you can secure this product for an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, which currently stands at $1,500,000.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
